name: Intertwined (Rumy)
description:
• Project done over the course of my game developer training (Interface 3)

For starters, keep in mind this is my very, VERY first game EVER.

It was made with an older version of Game Maker, as homework/first project. The game had to include a "real life" picture as one of the backgrounds, as well as bugs.

  • Synopsis

You play as a lady bug who accidentally gets stuck onto a spiderweb, and has to find a way out, while the spider's poison is creating one improbable world after another.
